PMHAnalysisStep: Breast ca s/p mastectomy ___ (no chemo or radiation therapy)-Acetaminophen: conflict detection result(false)
RevisedPrescription: Acetaminophen: Take 500mg-1000mg every 4-6 hours as needed for pain relief. Do not exceed 4g (4000mg) in a 24-hour period. Oral. Acetaminophen remains a suitable choice for pain relief in the headache associated with intra-parenchymal hemorrhage. It effectively manages mild to moderate pain without affecting platelet function, crucial in hemorrhagic cases. Additionally, there are no identified conflicts with other medications, ensuring safe use.
